1026170.name: Septerra Core - Soundtrack
1026170.description:
Enjoy Septerra's world apart from visuals with the Official Game Soundtrack!

Soundtrack composed and performed by Martin O’Donnell. Digitally remastered by Goran Bastinac. Published by TopWare Interactive.

PLAYLIST


  • 01. Legacy of the Creator -- [01:29]
  • 02. Septerras Ambient -- [05:54]
  • 03. The Chosen Ruins -- [05:59]
  • 04. Shell One -- [01:15]
  • 05. Shell Two -- [00:45]
  • 06. Shell Three -- [00:54]
  • 07. Shell Four -- [02:06]
  • 08. Shell Five -- [01:39]
  • 09. Shell Six -- [01:25]
  • 10. Shell Seven -- [01:40]
  • 11. Battletrack 1 -- [01:45]
  • 12. Battletrack 2 -- [01:28]
  • 13. Battletrack 3 -- [01:08]
  • 14. Battletrack 4 -- [01:50]
  • 15. Battletrack 5 -- [01:22]
  • 16. Battletrack 6 -- [01:26]
  • 17. Septerra Menu Theme -- [03:10]
